name: Twisted Fate
title: the Card Master
w_dispalyname: Pick a Card / Blue Card / Red Card / Gold Card

i.name: Loaded Dice
i.description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.

q.name: Wild Cards
q.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

w.name: Pick A Card
w.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.

e.name: Stacked Deck
e.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.

r.name: Destiny
r.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.

riot.name: Loaded Dice
riot.description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.

i1.name: Loaded Dice
i1.blurb: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Twisted Fate''' rolls his dice every time he kills an enemy, randomly gaining {{g|icononly=true}}{{pp|6|type=probability|1 to 6|key1=%|100*2/3/5 to 100*2/3/5;100/3|color=gold}}.
notes: * Total average of gold gained is {{g|4}}.

riot.name: Wild Cards
riot.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
riot.tooltip: Throws three cards that deal {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> Magic Damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

q1.name: Wild Cards
q1.blurb: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Twisted Fate''' throws three cards in a cone, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies they pass through.
q1.description2: Enemies can only be damaged once by ''Wild Cards''.

riot.name: Pick A Card
riot.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.
riot.tooltip:
Cast once to shuffle the deck and again to choose your card, enhancing your next attack.

Blue Card deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and restores {{ e6 }} Mana.

Red Card deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to units around the target and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for 2.5 seconds.

Gold Card deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and stuns for {{ e3 }} seconds.

w1.name: Pick a Card
w1.blurb: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.
w1.description: {{sbc|First Cast - Pick a Card:}} '''Twisted Fate''' cycles through {{ai|Blue Card||icononly=true}}{{ai|Red Card||icononly=true}}{{ai|Gold Card||icononly=true}} three cards for 6 seconds. Choosing one by reactivating ''Pick a Card'' converts '''Twisted Fate's''' next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds to instead deal {{as|magic damage}} and a bonus effect based on the card selected.
w1.leveling2:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|40 to 120}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Mana Restored|{{as|{{ap|50 to 150}}|mana}}}}
w1.description3: {{sbc|Second Cast - {{ai|Red Card}}:}} Deals {{as|magic damage}} around the target and {{tip|slow|slows}} all enemies hit for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
w1.leveling4:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|15 to 45}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Stun Duration|{{ap|1 to 2}}}}
notes: * ''Pick a Card'' will stack and can trigger {{ai|Stacked Deck|Twisted Fate}}.
* The first card shown on-first-cast is random but the order always remains the same ({{ai|Blue Card|Twisted Fate}}, {{ai|Red Card|Twisted Fate}}, {{ai|Gold Card|Twisted Fate}}, repeat).

riot.name: Stacked Deck
riot.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.

In addition, his Attack Speed is increased by {{ e3 }}%.

e1.name: Stacked Deck
e1.blurb: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.
e1.description2: {{sbc|Passive:}} Every fourth basic attack deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
notes: * Attacking turrets will generate stacks (does not apply to other structures) but will not consume the enhanced attack.

* ''Stacked Deck'' can be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} or negated if ''Twisted Fate'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} (the enhanced attack is not consumed in either case) but can only be mitigated if {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}} (the enhanced attack is consumed but the bonus damage is still applied)
* {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}} will generate stacks but will not consume the enhanced attack.

riot.name: Destiny
riot.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.
riot.tooltip:
Grants True Sight on all enemy champions on the map for {{ e1 }} seconds.

While Destiny is active, Twisted Fate can teleport up to {{ e4 }} units away in 1.5 seconds.

r1.name: Destiny
r1.blurb: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.
r1.description: {{sbc|First Cast - Destiny:}} '''Twisted Fate''' and his allies gain {{tip|true sight}} of all enemy champions for a few seconds. After a {{fd|0.5}} second delay, '''Twisted Fate''' can use {{ai|Gate}} once for the duration.
r1.description2: {{sbc|Second Cast - Gate:}} '''Twisted Fate''' {{ct|channel|channels|attack=false|move=false|cast=[[File:Pick a Card.png|20px]] Pick a Card is usable, the others are disabled|items=true,,interrupts,false,false|spells=false,false,false,false}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, {{tip|blink|blinking}} to the target location upon completion.
notes: * ''Destiny'' will reveal [[ward]]s, {{ai|Jack in the Box|Shaco}}, and/or {{ai|Noxious Trap|Teemo}} if they are within {{tip|sight}} range of a revealed enemy champion.
* ''Gate'' will be interrupted if ''Twisted Fate'' enters {{tip|stasis}} ({{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}, {{ai|Tempered Fate|Bard}}) while channeling.

* {{ai|Paranoia|Nocturne}} will prevent ''Destiny's'' {{tip|true sight}} regardless of which one was cast first (enemy champions can still be revealed by ''Destiny'' after {{ai|Paranoia|Nocturne}} ends if durations permit) but will not prevent ''Twisted Fate'' from using ''Gate''.

riot.name: Destiny
riot.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.
riot.tooltip:

While Destiny is active, Twisted Fate can teleport up to {{ e4 }} units away in 1.5 seconds.

r2.description2: {{sbc|Second Cast - Gate:}} '''Twisted Fate''' {{ct|channel|channels|attack=false|move=false|cast=[[File:Pick a Card.png|20px]] Pick a Card is usable, the others are disabled|items=true,,interrupts,false,false|spells=false,false,false,false}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, {{tip|blink|blinking}} to the target location upon completion.
notes: * ''Destiny'' will reveal [[ward]]s, {{ai|Jack in the Box|Shaco}}, and/or {{ai|Noxious Trap|Teemo}} if they are within {{tip|sight}} range of a revealed enemy champion.
* ''Gate'' will be interrupted if ''Twisted Fate'' enters {{tip|stasis}} ({{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}, {{ai|Tempered Fate|Bard}}) while channeling.

* {{ai|Paranoia|Nocturne}} will prevent ''Destiny's'' {{tip|true sight}} regardless of which one was cast first (enemy champions can still be revealed by ''Destiny'' after {{ai|Paranoia|Nocturne}} ends if durations permit) but will not prevent ''Twisted Fate'' from using ''Gate''.
